Class Xwalk

java.lang.Object
  Xwalk

public class Xwalk
extends java.lang.Object

Main class Xwalk that implements the main method to execute the virtual cross-link calculation.

Since:
0.1
Version:
0.1
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

Method Detail

readCommandline

public static CommandlineArguments readCommandline(java.lang.String[] args)
Reads all user arguments from the commandline. Note System.exit commands are executed if Exception occur during the read process of the commandline.

Parameters:
args - - Array of String object representing each one word on the commandline.
Returns:
CommandlineArguments object holding all user set commandline parameter.

createVirtualCrossLinks

public static CrossLinkList createVirtualCrossLinks(CrossLinkParameter parameter)
Creates virtual cross-links on the protein complexes given by the infile commandline parameter.

Parameters:
parameter - - CommandlineArguments object holding all user set commandline parameter.
Returns:
List of CrossLink objects found on the infile protein complexes.

getMonoLinks

public static MonoLinkList getMonoLinks(CrossLinkParameter parameter)
Returns a list of monoLinks for the protein complexes given by the infile commandline parameter.

Parameters:
parameter - - CommandlineArguments object holding all user set commandline parameter.
Returns:
List of MonoLink objects found on the infile protein complexes.

outputVirtualCrossLinks

public static void outputVirtualCrossLinks(CrossLinkParameter parameter,
                                           CrossLinkList crossLinks,
                                           MonoLinkList monoLinks)
Outputs all determined cross-links either on the terminal or into a file depending on user's choice.

Parameters:
parameter - - CommandlineArguments object holding all user set commandline parameter.
crossLinks - - List of CrossLink objects found on the infile protein complexes.
monoLinks - - List of MonoLink objects found on the infile protein complexes.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main program of Xwalk.

Parameters:
args - - String array of commandline arguments
